item.title: Product Content 1
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Avidlove is an international lingerie brand. Focus on women lingerie, babydoll, sleepwear, underwear, pj set, etc. We design with you in mind, we take a lot of times to test kinds of materials and develope different styles, only to present the best products, we believe that good quality of life is affordable, we do products with intentions, deliver a comfortable and beautiful life.

We have a wood burning stove and it gets pretty warm in our house. I was looking for something that would be light but also something I could walk around the house in with people around. This is light weight and very comfy. Although when the girls are cold you can clearly see them. It is actually just the right thickness to not be shear.

Features

  • Top: Sleeveless pajama set and scoop neckline with sheer lace panels, adjustable strap. Classic PJ sets in casual style , easy fit and lightweight
  • Bottom: Shorts with drawstring waistband to ensure the shorts remain easy fit, floral lace detail on both sides. Casual and stylish.
  • The Pajamas Set is made of soft modal fabric, let you move easily from back to side to stomach without any sheet friction, breathable, flexible, super soft and skin-friendly
  • Snuggle up with your sweetie in this pajamas set. Women's lace pajama shorts set matching cute tank top and lace summer shorts. Casual and Pajama Set for a relaxing day or night.
  • Gifts: Your Girlfriend, Wife, Mother, Sisters or Friends on Birthday, Christmas Day, New Year, Valentine's Day, Bridal Party Gifts, Honeymoon Vocation or other Festivals or Anniversaries.

item.title: Product Content 2
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Ekouaer Nightgown Womens Soft Night Shirt for Sleeping Sleepwear Short Sleeve Sleep Shirts

This short sleeve sleep shirt make you feel cool and more freedom.At the same time,the loose and lightweight night gown is not only give you soft and comfy touching but also can be better to hide your curve and make you charming and attractive.

This comfortable nighty for women accommodates almost body shapes.The length of this nightdress is to the middle of the thigh, A-line with more space, roomy armholes and short sleeves, simple pullover styling.Whether you're plus size, petite or somewhere in between, you ll find the perfect-fitting nighty for women from our 5 sizes that range from S-XXL

Perfect Night Gown for Home Wear

Loose curved hem, hits mid-thigh,short sleeves,this stylish and modest design will not cause any embarrassment when you meet your friends,play with your kids or pick up your mails.

Our V Neck Boyfriend sleep dress for women accommodates different kinds of body shapes and is ideal for all year around

It's a perfect pajamas dress for relaxing on the sofa ,cooking and doing some house work,playing with on weekends

item.content:encoded:
Ekouaer Women's Nightgown V Neck Lace Trim Short Sleeve Sleep Shirt Contrast Color Sleepwear

  • Made of comfortable and lightweight modal fabric, this soft nightgown is super soft for your skin, may help you have a good sleep.
  • Sexy V- neck with lace decoration, on this classic sleepwear you will looks more charming and attractive.
  • Designed with contrast color patchwork in the bottom of the sleeves and hemline, this fashionable loungewear dress make you pretty at your home.

Enjoy Your Sleep,Enjoy Your Life!

It's a great choice for your wife, girlfriend, sister and daughter as a Birthday gift, or for the Mother Day, Valentine's Day and Christmas

This soft sleep dress is great for lounging around the house, enjoying reading on the sofa, walking down the driveway to get the paper

item.content:encoded:
A fashion can become the prevailing style in behaviour or manifest the newest creations of designers, technologists, engineers, and design managers.

The pace of change accelerated considerably in the following century, and women and men's fashion, especially in the dressing and adorning of the hair, became equally complex. Art historians are therefore able to use fashion with confidence and precision to date images, often to within five years, particularly in the case of images from the 15th century. Initially, changes in fashion led to a fragmentation across the upper classes of Europe.

I ordered a skirt from Lorada, after I bought it I looked at the reviews and then got really concerned that it wouldnt show up. But I was proven wrong, I got the skirt 9 days after ordering it and it was in good condition.

Fashion Industry

  • The production of raw materials, principally fibers and textiles but also leather and fur.
  • The production of fashion goods by designers, manufacturers, contractors, and others.
  • Retail sales
  • Various forms of advertising and promotion

Fashion Trend

Fashion trends are influenced by several factors including cinema, celebrities, climate, creative explorations, political, economical, social and technological. Examining these factors is called a PEST analysis. Fashion forecasters can use this information to help determine growth or decline of a particular trend. Fashion trends change daily, it can not stay unchanged

item.title: Size Guide Text
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Our size charts and measuring tips will help you order the correct size. If you don't have measuring tape available, no problem. Simply use a ribbon or piece of string and line it up against a ruler.
If youre still unsure what size to go with, reach out to our wonderful Customer Loyalty Team. Were here 24/7 to deliver world-class customer service! Give us a call or live chat with us today. And remember, if you end up ordering the wrong size, Zappos offers free exchanges.

item.title: 5 Things To Do Immediately About PAJAMAS
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

A fashion can become the prevailing style in behaviour or manifest the newest creations of designers, technologists, engineers, and design managers.

The pace of change accelerated considerably in the following century, and women and men's fashion, especially in the dressing and adorning of the hair, became equally complex. Art historians are therefore able to use fashion with confidence and precision to date images, often to within five years, particularly in the case of images from the 15th century. Initially, changes in fashion led to a fragmentation across the upper classes of Europe.

I ordered a skirt from Lorada, after I bought it I looked at the reviews and then got really concerned that it wouldnt show up. But I was proven wrong, I got the skirt 9 days after ordering it and it was in good condition.

Fashion Industry

  • The production of raw materials, principally fibers and textiles but also leather and fur.
  • The production of fashion goods by designers, manufacturers, contractors, and others.
  • Retail sales
  • Various forms of advertising and promotion

Fashion Trend

Fashion trends are influenced by several factors including cinema, celebrities, climate, creative explorations, political, economical, social and technological. Examining these factors is called a PEST analysis. Fashion forecasters can use this information to help determine growth or decline of a particular trend. Fashion trends change daily, it can not stay unchanged

Avidlove Nightgown for Women Sleep Dress Babydoll Sleepwear Cami Dress

This nightgowns featuring adjustable Spaghetti straps, V-neckline with bow decorate, Lace trims at neckline and hem, A-line silhouette hits at mid-thigh. Chemise sleepwear for women is super comfy and versatile, it can be a slip under your clothes, like coat or sweater, or wear to bed as a nightie, loungewear Women slip nightgown, chemise, women sleepwear, lace chemise babydoll, wonderful gift for wife or friends or yourself as sleepwear, loungwear, nighties.

Perfect for Valentines Day, date nights, wedding nights lingerie, honeymoon nights lingerie, bride wedding, holiday, Christmas lingerie, role play and lingerie party Chemise Sleepwear is made of high quality cotton, which is stretchy, comfortable and soft, ensuring you enjoy it.

item.title: Bamboo Full Slip Nightgowns
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Ekouaer Nightgown Womens Soft Night Shirt for Sleeping Sleepwear Short Sleeve Sleep Shirts

This short sleeve sleep shirt make you feel cool and more freedom.At the same time,the loose and lightweight night gown is not only give you soft and comfy touching but also can be better to hide your curve and make you charming and attractive.

This comfortable nighty for women accommodates almost body shapes.The length of this nightdress is to the middle of the thigh, A-line with more space, roomy armholes and short sleeves, simple pullover styling.Whether you're plus size, petite or somewhere in between, you ll find the perfect-fitting nighty for women from our 5 sizes that range from S-XXL

Perfect Night Gown for Home Wear

Loose curved hem, hits mid-thigh,short sleeves,this stylish and modest design will not cause any embarrassment when you meet your friends,play with your kids or pick up your mails.

Our V Neck Boyfriend sleep dress for women accommodates different kinds of body shapes and is ideal for all year around

It's a perfect pajamas dress for relaxing on the sofa ,cooking and doing some house work,playing with on weekends

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: The blue I washed in standard tap cold water, there was some color bleed but not more than I expected. The red I washed in lukewarm water. The color bleeding got profuse very quickly, especially after some light manipulation with detergent applied directly to fabric. I was shocked, had I thrown these in the wash for the first time run they would have ruined everything else in the load.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: The blue I washed in standard tap cold water, there was some color bleed but not more than I expected. The red I washed in lukewarm water. The color bleeding got profuse very quickly, especially after some light manipulation with detergent applied directly to fabric. I was shocked, had I thrown these in the wash for the first time run they would have ruined everything else in the load.
I love how soft this gown is. It also fits perfectly. I am 53 130 lbs and a small fits perfect. Comes just a above the knees.

item.title: Lingerie Halter Dress Lace Nightgown
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Avidlove is an international lingerie brand. Focus on women lingerie, babydoll, sleepwear, underwear, pj set, etc. We design with you in mind, we take a lot of times to test kinds of materials and develope different styles, only to present the best products, we believe that good quality of life is affordable, we do products with intentions, deliver a comfortable and beautiful life.

We have a wood burning stove and it gets pretty warm in our house. I was looking for something that would be light but also something I could walk around the house in with people around. This is light weight and very comfy. Although when the girls are cold you can clearly see them. It is actually just the right thickness to not be shear.

Features

  • Top: Sleeveless pajama set and scoop neckline with sheer lace panels, adjustable strap. Classic PJ sets in casual style , easy fit and lightweight
  • Bottom: Shorts with drawstring waistband to ensure the shorts remain easy fit, floral lace detail on both sides. Casual and stylish.
  • The Pajamas Set is made of soft modal fabric, let you move easily from back to side to stomach without any sheet friction, breathable, flexible, super soft and skin-friendly
  • Snuggle up with your sweetie in this pajamas set. Women's lace pajama shorts set matching cute tank top and lace summer shorts. Casual and Pajama Set for a relaxing day or night.
  • Gifts: Your Girlfriend, Wife, Mother, Sisters or Friends on Birthday, Christmas Day, New Year, Valentine's Day, Bridal Party Gifts, Honeymoon Vocation or other Festivals or Anniversaries.

item.title: 3 Things Everyone Knows About PAJAMAS That You Don't
item.dc:creator: angela_mayer
item.content:encoded:
A fashion can become the prevailing style in behaviour or manifest the newest creations of designers, technologists, engineers, and design managers.

The pace of change accelerated considerably in the following century, and women and men's fashion, especially in the dressing and adorning of the hair, became equally complex. Art historians are therefore able to use fashion with confidence and precision to date images, often to within five years, particularly in the case of images from the 15th century. Initially, changes in fashion led to a fragmentation across the upper classes of Europe.

I ordered a skirt from Lorada, after I bought it I looked at the reviews and then got really concerned that it wouldnt show up. But I was proven wrong, I got the skirt 9 days after ordering it and it was in good condition.

Fashion Industry

  • The production of raw materials, principally fibers and textiles but also leather and fur.
  • The production of fashion goods by designers, manufacturers, contractors, and others.
  • Retail sales
  • Various forms of advertising and promotion

Fashion Trend

Fashion trends are influenced by several factors including cinema, celebrities, climate, creative explorations, political, economical, social and technological. Examining these factors is called a PEST analysis. Fashion forecasters can use this information to help determine growth or decline of a particular trend. Fashion trends change daily, it can not stay unchanged

item.title: Revolutionize Your PAJAMAS With These Easy-peasy Tips
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
A fashion can become the prevailing style in behaviour or manifest the newest creations of designers, technologists, engineers, and design managers.

The pace of change accelerated considerably in the following century, and women and men's fashion, especially in the dressing and adorning of the hair, became equally complex. Art historians are therefore able to use fashion with confidence and precision to date images, often to within five years, particularly in the case of images from the 15th century. Initially, changes in fashion led to a fragmentation across the upper classes of Europe.

I ordered a skirt from Lorada, after I bought it I looked at the reviews and then got really concerned that it wouldnt show up. But I was proven wrong, I got the skirt 9 days after ordering it and it was in good condition.

Fashion Industry

  • The production of raw materials, principally fibers and textiles but also leather and fur.
  • The production of fashion goods by designers, manufacturers, contractors, and others.
  • Retail sales
  • Various forms of advertising and promotion

Fashion Trend

Fashion trends are influenced by several factors including cinema, celebrities, climate, creative explorations, political, economical, social and technological. Examining these factors is called a PEST analysis. Fashion forecasters can use this information to help determine growth or decline of a particular trend. Fashion trends change daily, it can not stay unchanged

item.title: How To Turn Your PAJAMAS From Zero To Hero?
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
A fashion can become the prevailing style in behaviour or manifest the newest creations of designers, technologists, engineers, and design managers.

The pace of change accelerated considerably in the following century, and women and men's fashion, especially in the dressing and adorning of the hair, became equally complex. Art historians are therefore able to use fashion with confidence and precision to date images, often to within five years, particularly in the case of images from the 15th century. Initially, changes in fashion led to a fragmentation across the upper classes of Europe.

I ordered a skirt from Lorada, after I bought it I looked at the reviews and then got really concerned that it wouldnt show up. But I was proven wrong, I got the skirt 9 days after ordering it and it was in good condition.

Fashion Industry

  • The production of raw materials, principally fibers and textiles but also leather and fur.
  • The production of fashion goods by designers, manufacturers, contractors, and others.
  • Retail sales
  • Various forms of advertising and promotion

Fashion Trend

Fashion trends are influenced by several factors including cinema, celebrities, climate, creative explorations, political, economical, social and technological. Examining these factors is called a PEST analysis. Fashion forecasters can use this information to help determine growth or decline of a particular trend. Fashion trends change daily, it can not stay unchanged

Avidlove Nightgown for Women Sleep Dress Babydoll Sleepwear Cami Dress

This nightgowns featuring adjustable Spaghetti straps, V-neckline with bow decorate, Lace trims at neckline and hem, A-line silhouette hits at mid-thigh. Chemise sleepwear for women is super comfy and versatile, it can be a slip under your clothes, like coat or sweater, or wear to bed as a nightie, loungewear Women slip nightgown, chemise, women sleepwear, lace chemise babydoll, wonderful gift for wife or friends or yourself as sleepwear, loungwear, nighties.

Perfect for Valentines Day, date nights, wedding nights lingerie, honeymoon nights lingerie, bride wedding, holiday, Christmas lingerie, role play and lingerie party Chemise Sleepwear is made of high quality cotton, which is stretchy, comfortable and soft, ensuring you enjoy it.

item.title: Now You Can Have Your PAJAMAS Done Safely
item.dc:creator: lennon_M
item.content:encoded:
A fashion can become the prevailing style in behaviour or manifest the newest creations of designers, technologists, engineers, and design managers.

The pace of change accelerated considerably in the following century, and women and men's fashion, especially in the dressing and adorning of the hair, became equally complex. Art historians are therefore able to use fashion with confidence and precision to date images, often to within five years, particularly in the case of images from the 15th century. Initially, changes in fashion led to a fragmentation across the upper classes of Europe.

I ordered a skirt from Lorada, after I bought it I looked at the reviews and then got really concerned that it wouldnt show up. But I was proven wrong, I got the skirt 9 days after ordering it and it was in good condition.

Fashion Industry

  • The production of raw materials, principally fibers and textiles but also leather and fur.
  • The production of fashion goods by designers, manufacturers, contractors, and others.
  • Retail sales
  • Various forms of advertising and promotion

Fashion Trend

Fashion trends are influenced by several factors including cinema, celebrities, climate, creative explorations, political, economical, social and technological. Examining these factors is called a PEST analysis. Fashion forecasters can use this information to help determine growth or decline of a particular trend. Fashion trends change daily, it can not stay unchanged

Avidlove Nightgown for Women Sleep Dress Babydoll Sleepwear Cami Dress

This nightgowns featuring adjustable Spaghetti straps, V-neckline with bow decorate, Lace trims at neckline and hem, A-line silhouette hits at mid-thigh. Chemise sleepwear for women is super comfy and versatile, it can be a slip under your clothes, like coat or sweater, or wear to bed as a nightie, loungewear Women slip nightgown, chemise, women sleepwear, lace chemise babydoll, wonderful gift for wife or friends or yourself as sleepwear, loungwear, nighties.

Perfect for Valentines Day, date nights, wedding nights lingerie, honeymoon nights lingerie, bride wedding, holiday, Christmas lingerie, role play and lingerie party Chemise Sleepwear is made of high quality cotton, which is stretchy, comfortable and soft, ensuring you enjoy it.

item.title: What Make PAJAMAS Don't Want You To Know?
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
A fashion can become the prevailing style in behaviour or manifest the newest creations of designers, technologists, engineers, and design managers.

The pace of change accelerated considerably in the following century, and women and men's fashion, especially in the dressing and adorning of the hair, became equally complex. Art historians are therefore able to use fashion with confidence and precision to date images, often to within five years, particularly in the case of images from the 15th century. Initially, changes in fashion led to a fragmentation across the upper classes of Europe.

I ordered a skirt from Lorada, after I bought it I looked at the reviews and then got really concerned that it wouldnt show up. But I was proven wrong, I got the skirt 9 days after ordering it and it was in good condition.

Fashion Industry

  • The production of raw materials, principally fibers and textiles but also leather and fur.
  • The production of fashion goods by designers, manufacturers, contractors, and others.
  • Retail sales
  • Various forms of advertising and promotion

Fashion Trend

Fashion trends are influenced by several factors including cinema, celebrities, climate, creative explorations, political, economical, social and technological. Examining these factors is called a PEST analysis. Fashion forecasters can use this information to help determine growth or decline of a particular trend. Fashion trends change daily, it can not stay unchanged

Avidlove Nightgown for Women Sleep Dress Babydoll Sleepwear Cami Dress

This nightgowns featuring adjustable Spaghetti straps, V-neckline with bow decorate, Lace trims at neckline and hem, A-line silhouette hits at mid-thigh. Chemise sleepwear for women is super comfy and versatile, it can be a slip under your clothes, like coat or sweater, or wear to bed as a nightie, loungewear Women slip nightgown, chemise, women sleepwear, lace chemise babydoll, wonderful gift for wife or friends or yourself as sleepwear, loungwear, nighties.

Perfect for Valentines Day, date nights, wedding nights lingerie, honeymoon nights lingerie, bride wedding, holiday, Christmas lingerie, role play and lingerie party Chemise Sleepwear is made of high quality cotton, which is stretchy, comfortable and soft, ensuring you enjoy it.

A fashion can become the prevailing style in behaviour or manifest the newest creations of designers, technologists, engineers, and design managers.

The pace of change accelerated considerably in the following century, and women and men's fashion, especially in the dressing and adorning of the hair, became equally complex. Art historians are therefore able to use fashion with confidence and precision to date images, often to within five years, particularly in the case of images from the 15th century. Initially, changes in fashion led to a fragmentation across the upper classes of Europe.

I ordered a skirt from Lorada, after I bought it I looked at the reviews and then got really concerned that it wouldnt show up. But I was proven wrong, I got the skirt 9 days after ordering it and it was in good condition.

Fashion Industry

  • The production of raw materials, principally fibers and textiles but also leather and fur.
  • The production of fashion goods by designers, manufacturers, contractors, and others.
  • Retail sales
  • Various forms of advertising and promotion

Fashion Trend

Fashion trends are influenced by several factors including cinema, celebrities, climate, creative explorations, political, economical, social and technological. Examining these factors is called a PEST analysis. Fashion forecasters can use this information to help determine growth or decline of a particular trend. Fashion trends change daily, it can not stay unchanged

Avidlove Nightgown for Women Sleep Dress Babydoll Sleepwear Cami Dress

This nightgowns featuring adjustable Spaghetti straps, V-neckline with bow decorate, Lace trims at neckline and hem, A-line silhouette hits at mid-thigh. Chemise sleepwear for women is super comfy and versatile, it can be a slip under your clothes, like coat or sweater, or wear to bed as a nightie, loungewear Women slip nightgown, chemise, women sleepwear, lace chemise babydoll, wonderful gift for wife or friends or yourself as sleepwear, loungwear, nighties.

Perfect for Valentines Day, date nights, wedding nights lingerie, honeymoon nights lingerie, bride wedding, holiday, Christmas lingerie, role play and lingerie party Chemise Sleepwear is made of high quality cotton, which is stretchy, comfortable and soft, ensuring you enjoy it.

item.title: Lingerie Satin Lace Chemise Nightgown
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Ekouaer Nightgown Womens Soft Night Shirt for Sleeping Sleepwear Short Sleeve Sleep Shirts

This short sleeve sleep shirt make you feel cool and more freedom.At the same time,the loose and lightweight night gown is not only give you soft and comfy touching but also can be better to hide your curve and make you charming and attractive.

This comfortable nighty for women accommodates almost body shapes.The length of this nightdress is to the middle of the thigh, A-line with more space, roomy armholes and short sleeves, simple pullover styling.Whether you're plus size, petite or somewhere in between, you ll find the perfect-fitting nighty for women from our 5 sizes that range from S-XXL

Perfect Night Gown for Home Wear

Loose curved hem, hits mid-thigh,short sleeves,this stylish and modest design will not cause any embarrassment when you meet your friends,play with your kids or pick up your mails.

Our V Neck Boyfriend sleep dress for women accommodates different kinds of body shapes and is ideal for all year around

It's a perfect pajamas dress for relaxing on the sofa ,cooking and doing some house work,playing with on weekends

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I loved this set! The material is smooth and comfortable it fit perfectly, mainly because Im tiny and I can never find XS, and I feel like a princess with these. I had always wore old shirts and sweats to sleep, this was a nice upgrade ;) very happy

item.content:encoded:
Ekouaer Women's Nightgown V Neck Lace Trim Short Sleeve Sleep Shirt Contrast Color Sleepwear

  • Made of comfortable and lightweight modal fabric, this soft nightgown is super soft for your skin, may help you have a good sleep.
  • Sexy V- neck with lace decoration, on this classic sleepwear you will looks more charming and attractive.
  • Designed with contrast color patchwork in the bottom of the sleeves and hemline, this fashionable loungewear dress make you pretty at your home.

Enjoy Your Sleep,Enjoy Your Life!

It's a great choice for your wife, girlfriend, sister and daughter as a Birthday gift, or for the Mother Day, Valentine's Day and Christmas

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: The blue I washed in standard tap cold water, there was some color bleed but not more than I expected. The red I washed in lukewarm water. The color bleeding got profuse very quickly, especially after some light manipulation with detergent applied directly to fabric. I was shocked, had I thrown these in the wash for the first time run they would have ruined everything else in the load.

item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Ekouaer Nightgown Womens Soft Night Shirt for Sleeping Sleepwear Short Sleeve Sleep Shirts

This short sleeve sleep shirt make you feel cool and more freedom.At the same time,the loose and lightweight night gown is not only give you soft and comfy touching but also can be better to hide your curve and make you charming and attractive.

This comfortable nighty for women accommodates almost body shapes.The length of this nightdress is to the middle of the thigh, A-line with more space, roomy armholes and short sleeves, simple pullover styling.Whether you're plus size, petite or somewhere in between, you ll find the perfect-fitting nighty for women from our 5 sizes that range from S-XXL

Perfect Night Gown for Home Wear

Loose curved hem, hits mid-thigh,short sleeves,this stylish and modest design will not cause any embarrassment when you meet your friends,play with your kids or pick up your mails.

Our V Neck Boyfriend sleep dress for women accommodates different kinds of body shapes and is ideal for all year around

It's a perfect pajamas dress for relaxing on the sofa ,cooking and doing some house work,playing with on weekends

item.title: Nightwear Soft Pajamas Lounge Sets
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Ekouaer Women's Nightgown V Neck Lace Trim Short Sleeve Sleep Shirt Contrast Color Sleepwear

  • Made of comfortable and lightweight modal fabric, this soft nightgown is super soft for your skin, may help you have a good sleep.
  • Sexy V- neck with lace decoration, on this classic sleepwear you will looks more charming and attractive.
  • Designed with contrast color patchwork in the bottom of the sleeves and hemline, this fashionable loungewear dress make you pretty at your home.

Enjoy Your Sleep,Enjoy Your Life!

It's a great choice for your wife, girlfriend, sister and daughter as a Birthday gift, or for the Mother Day, Valentine's Day and Christmas

This soft sleep dress is great for lounging around the house, enjoying reading on the sofa, walking down the driveway to get the paper

Raglan short sleeves, scoop neck top and elastic waist, full-length pants.No buttons.No pockets.No drawstring. Enjoy staying comfy and cozy at any time when sleeping or lounging. Comfy sleepwear aren't just reserved for the bedroom,our pajamas are now chic enough for the streets. Easy fit and Pull on closure.This cute & loose lounge set for women is the best pajamas.

item.title: Pajama Set Modal Sleepwear
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Avidlove is an international lingerie brand. Focus on women lingerie, babydoll, sleepwear, underwear, pj set, etc. We design with you in mind, we take a lot of times to test kinds of materials and develope different styles, only to present the best products, we believe that good quality of life is affordable, we do products with intentions, deliver a comfortable and beautiful life.

We have a wood burning stove and it gets pretty warm in our house. I was looking for something that would be light but also something I could walk around the house in with people around. This is light weight and very comfy. Although when the girls are cold you can clearly see them. It is actually just the right thickness to not be shear.

Features

  • Top: Sleeveless pajama set and scoop neckline with sheer lace panels, adjustable strap. Classic PJ sets in casual style , easy fit and lightweight
  • Bottom: Shorts with drawstring waistband to ensure the shorts remain easy fit, floral lace detail on both sides. Casual and stylish.
  • The Pajamas Set is made of soft modal fabric, let you move easily from back to side to stomach without any sheet friction, breathable, flexible, super soft and skin-friendly
  • Snuggle up with your sweetie in this pajamas set. Women's lace pajama shorts set matching cute tank top and lace summer shorts. Casual and Pajama Set for a relaxing day or night.
  • Gifts: Your Girlfriend, Wife, Mother, Sisters or Friends on Birthday, Christmas Day, New Year, Valentine's Day, Bridal Party Gifts, Honeymoon Vocation or other Festivals or Anniversaries.

item.title: Pajamas Set Button Down Nightwear
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Avidlove is an international lingerie brand. Focus on women lingerie, babydoll, sleepwear, underwear, pj set, etc. We design with you in mind, we take a lot of times to test kinds of materials and develope different styles, only to present the best products, we believe that good quality of life is affordable, we do products with intentions, deliver a comfortable and beautiful life. We have a wood burning stove and it gets pretty warm in our house. I was looking for something that would be light but also something I could walk around the house in with people around. This is light weight and very comfy. Although when the girls are cold you can clearly see them. It is actually just the right thickness to not be shear.

Features

  • Top: Sleeveless pajama set and scoop neckline with sheer lace panels, adjustable strap. Classic PJ sets in casual style , easy fit and lightweight
  • Bottom: Shorts with drawstring waistband to ensure the shorts remain easy fit, floral lace detail on both sides. Casual and stylish.
  • The Pajamas Set is made of soft modal fabric, let you move easily from back to side to stomach without any sheet friction, breathable, flexible, super soft and skin-friendly
  • Snuggle up with your sweetie in this pajamas set. Women's lace pajama shorts set matching cute tank top and lace summer shorts. Casual and Pajama Set for a relaxing day or night.
  • Gifts: Your Girlfriend, Wife, Mother, Sisters or Friends on Birthday, Christmas Day, New Year, Valentine's Day, Bridal Party Gifts, Honeymoon Vocation or other Festivals or Anniversaries.

Perfect Night Gown for Home Wear

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I loved this set! The material is smooth and comfortable it fit perfectly, mainly because Im tiny and I can never find XS, and I feel like a princess with these. I had always wore old shirts and sweats to sleep, this was a nice upgrade ;) very happy

item.title: Satin Pajamas Shorts Set
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Avidlove is an international lingerie brand. Focus on women lingerie, babydoll, sleepwear, underwear, pj set, etc. We design with you in mind, we take a lot of times to test kinds of materials and develope different styles, only to present the best products, we believe that good quality of life is affordable, we do products with intentions, deliver a comfortable and beautiful life. We have a wood burning stove and it gets pretty warm in our house. I was looking for something that would be light but also something I could walk around the house in with people around. This is light weight and very comfy. Although when the girls are cold you can clearly see them. It is actually just the right thickness to not be shear.

Features

  • Top: Sleeveless pajama set and scoop neckline with sheer lace panels, adjustable strap. Classic PJ sets in casual style , easy fit and lightweight
  • Bottom: Shorts with drawstring waistband to ensure the shorts remain easy fit, floral lace detail on both sides. Casual and stylish.
  • The Pajamas Set is made of soft modal fabric, let you move easily from back to side to stomach without any sheet friction, breathable, flexible, super soft and skin-friendly
  • Snuggle up with your sweetie in this pajamas set. Women's lace pajama shorts set matching cute tank top and lace summer shorts. Casual and Pajama Set for a relaxing day or night.
  • Gifts: Your Girlfriend, Wife, Mother, Sisters or Friends on Birthday, Christmas Day, New Year, Valentine's Day, Bridal Party Gifts, Honeymoon Vocation or other Festivals or Anniversaries.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I loved this set! The material is smooth and comfortable it fit perfectly, mainly because Im tiny and I can never find XS, and I feel like a princess with these. I had always wore old shirts and sweats to sleep, this was a nice upgrade ;) very happy
I love how soft this gown is. It also fits perfectly. I am 53 130 lbs and a small fits perfect. Comes just a above the knees.

Ekouaer Women's Nightgown V Neck Lace Trim Short Sleeve Sleep Shirt Contrast Color Sleepwear

  • Made of comfortable and lightweight modal fabric, this soft nightgown is super soft for your skin, may help you have a good sleep.
  • Sexy V- neck with lace decoration, on this classic sleepwear you will looks more charming and attractive.
  • Designed with contrast color patchwork in the bottom of the sleeves and hemline, this fashionable loungewear dress make you pretty at your home.

Enjoy Your Sleep,Enjoy Your Life!

It's a great choice for your wife, girlfriend, sister and daughter as a Birthday gift, or for the Mother Day, Valentine's Day and Christmas This soft sleep dress is great for lounging around the house, enjoying reading on the sofa, walking down the driveway to get the paper

Raglan short sleeves, scoop neck top and elastic waist, full-length pants.No buttons.No pockets.No drawstring. Enjoy staying comfy and cozy at any time when sleeping or lounging. Comfy sleepwear aren't just reserved for the bedroom,our pajamas are now chic enough for the streets. Easy fit and Pull on closure.This cute & loose lounge set for women is the best pajamas. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sDbP8x53dE4

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: The blue I washed in standard tap cold water, there was some color bleed but not more than I expected. The red I washed in lukewarm water. The color bleeding got profuse very quickly, especially after some light manipulation with detergent applied directly to fabric. I was shocked, had I thrown these in the wash for the first time run they would have ruined everything else in the load.

item.title: Camisole Short Sets Lingerie Satin
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Avidlove is an international lingerie brand. Focus on women lingerie, babydoll, sleepwear, underwear, pj set, etc. We design with you in mind, we take a lot of times to test kinds of materials and develope different styles, only to present the best products, we believe that good quality of life is affordable, we do products with intentions, deliver a comfortable and beautiful life.

We have a wood burning stove and it gets pretty warm in our house. I was looking for something that would be light but also something I could walk around the house in with people around. This is light weight and very comfy. Although when the girls are cold you can clearly see them. It is actually just the right thickness to not be shear.

Features

  • Top: Sleeveless pajama set and scoop neckline with sheer lace panels, adjustable strap. Classic PJ sets in casual style , easy fit and lightweight
  • Bottom: Shorts with drawstring waistband to ensure the shorts remain easy fit, floral lace detail on both sides. Casual and stylish.
  • The Pajamas Set is made of soft modal fabric, let you move easily from back to side to stomach without any sheet friction, breathable, flexible, super soft and skin-friendly
  • Snuggle up with your sweetie in this pajamas set. Women's lace pajama shorts set matching cute tank top and lace summer shorts. Casual and Pajama Set for a relaxing day or night.
  • Gifts: Your Girlfriend, Wife, Mother, Sisters or Friends on Birthday, Christmas Day, New Year, Valentine's Day, Bridal Party Gifts, Honeymoon Vocation or other Festivals or Anniversaries.

item.content:encoded:
Ekouaer Nightgown Womens Soft Night Shirt for Sleeping Sleepwear Short Sleeve Sleep Shirts

This short sleeve sleep shirt make you feel cool and more freedom.At the same time,the loose and lightweight night gown is not only give you soft and comfy touching but also can be better to hide your curve and make you charming and attractive.

This comfortable nighty for women accommodates almost body shapes.The length of this nightdress is to the middle of the thigh, A-line with more space, roomy armholes and short sleeves, simple pullover styling.Whether you're plus size, petite or somewhere in between, you ll find the perfect-fitting nighty for women from our 5 sizes that range from S-XXL

Perfect Night Gown for Home Wear

Loose curved hem, hits mid-thigh,short sleeves,this stylish and modest design will not cause any embarrassment when you meet your friends,play with your kids or pick up your mails.

Our V Neck Boyfriend sleep dress for women accommodates different kinds of body shapes and is ideal for all year around

It's a perfect pajamas dress for relaxing on the sofa ,cooking and doing some house work,playing with on weekends

item.title: Nightwear Lingerie Gown Sleep
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Avidlove is an international lingerie brand. Focus on women lingerie, babydoll, sleepwear, underwear, pj set, etc. We design with you in mind, we take a lot of times to test kinds of materials and develope different styles, only to present the best products, we believe that good quality of life is affordable, we do products with intentions, deliver a comfortable and beautiful life.

We have a wood burning stove and it gets pretty warm in our house. I was looking for something that would be light but also something I could walk around the house in with people around. This is light weight and very comfy. Although when the girls are cold you can clearly see them. It is actually just the right thickness to not be shear.

Features

  • Top: Sleeveless pajama set and scoop neckline with sheer lace panels, adjustable strap. Classic PJ sets in casual style , easy fit and lightweight
  • Bottom: Shorts with drawstring waistband to ensure the shorts remain easy fit, floral lace detail on both sides. Casual and stylish.
  • The Pajamas Set is made of soft modal fabric, let you move easily from back to side to stomach without any sheet friction, breathable, flexible, super soft and skin-friendly
  • Snuggle up with your sweetie in this pajamas set. Women's lace pajama shorts set matching cute tank top and lace summer shorts. Casual and Pajama Set for a relaxing day or night.
  • Gifts: Your Girlfriend, Wife, Mother, Sisters or Friends on Birthday, Christmas Day, New Year, Valentine's Day, Bridal Party Gifts, Honeymoon Vocation or other Festivals or Anniversaries.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I loved this set! The material is smooth and comfortable it fit perfectly, mainly because Im tiny and I can never find XS, and I feel like a princess with these. I had always wore old shirts and sweats to sleep, this was a nice upgrade ;) very happy
I love how soft this gown is. It also fits perfectly. I am 53 130 lbs and a small fits perfect. Comes just a above the knees.

item.content:encoded:
Ekouaer Nightgown Womens Soft Night Shirt for Sleeping Sleepwear Short Sleeve Sleep Shirts
This short sleeve sleep shirt make you feel cool and more freedom.At the same time,the loose and lightweight night gown is not only give you soft and comfy touching but also can be better to hide your curve and make you charming and attractive. This comfortable nighty for women accommodates almost body shapes.The length of this nightdress is to the middle of the thigh, A-line with more space, roomy armholes and short sleeves, simple pullover styling.Whether you're plus size, petite or somewhere in between, you ll find the perfect-fitting nighty for women from our 5 sizes that range from S-XXL
Perfect Night Gown for Home Wear
Loose curved hem, hits mid-thigh,short sleeves,this stylish and modest design will not cause any embarrassment when you meet your friends,play with your kids or pick up your mails. Our V Neck Boyfriend sleep dress for women accommodates different kinds of body shapes and is ideal for all year around It's a perfect pajamas dress for relaxing on the sofa ,cooking and doing some house work,playing with on weekends

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I got the blue colour which matches the advertised pic, the material and comfort are lovely! I will potentially buy another one!
I love how soft this gown is. It also fits perfectly. I am 53 130 lbs and a small fits perfect. Comes just a above the knees.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: The blue I washed in standard tap cold water, there was some color bleed but not more than I expected. The red I washed in lukewarm water. The color bleeding got profuse very quickly, especially after some light manipulation with detergent applied directly to fabric. I was shocked, had I thrown these in the wash for the first time run they would have ruined everything else in the load.

item.title: Sleepwear Lingerie Satin Pajamas
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Avidlove is an international lingerie brand. Focus on women lingerie, babydoll, sleepwear, underwear, pj set, etc. We design with you in mind, we take a lot of times to test kinds of materials and develope different styles, only to present the best products, we believe that good quality of life is affordable, we do products with intentions, deliver a comfortable and beautiful life. We have a wood burning stove and it gets pretty warm in our house. I was looking for something that would be light but also something I could walk around the house in with people around. This is light weight and very comfy. Although when the girls are cold you can clearly see them. It is actually just the right thickness to not be shear.

Features

  • Top: Sleeveless pajama set and scoop neckline with sheer lace panels, adjustable strap. Classic PJ sets in casual style , easy fit and lightweight
  • Bottom: Shorts with drawstring waistband to ensure the shorts remain easy fit, floral lace detail on both sides. Casual and stylish.
  • The Pajamas Set is made of soft modal fabric, let you move easily from back to side to stomach without any sheet friction, breathable, flexible, super soft and skin-friendly
  • Snuggle up with your sweetie in this pajamas set. Women's lace pajama shorts set matching cute tank top and lace summer shorts. Casual and Pajama Set for a relaxing day or night.
  • Gifts: Your Girlfriend, Wife, Mother, Sisters or Friends on Birthday, Christmas Day, New Year, Valentine's Day, Bridal Party Gifts, Honeymoon Vocation or other Festivals or Anniversaries.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I got the blue colour which matches the advertised pic, the material and comfort are lovely! I will potentially buy another one!
I love how soft this gown is. It also fits perfectly. I am 53 130 lbs and a small fits perfect. Comes just a above the knees.

item.title: Vlazom Satin Nightshirts Nightdress
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Ekouaer Nightgown Womens Soft Night Shirt for Sleeping Sleepwear Short Sleeve Sleep Shirts
This short sleeve sleep shirt make you feel cool and more freedom.At the same time,the loose and lightweight night gown is not only give you soft and comfy touching but also can be better to hide your curve and make you charming and attractive. This comfortable nighty for women accommodates almost body shapes.The length of this nightdress is to the middle of the thigh, A-line with more space, roomy armholes and short sleeves, simple pullover styling.Whether you're plus size, petite or somewhere in between, you ll find the perfect-fitting nighty for women from our 5 sizes that range from S-XXL
Perfect Night Gown for Home Wear
Loose curved hem, hits mid-thigh,short sleeves,this stylish and modest design will not cause any embarrassment when you meet your friends,play with your kids or pick up your mails. Our V Neck Boyfriend sleep dress for women accommodates different kinds of body shapes and is ideal for all year around It's a perfect pajamas dress for relaxing on the sofa ,cooking and doing some house work,playing with on weekends
